title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 362.1 - Fees for searches and certificates concerning estate and transfer tax proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 362.1 - Fees for searches and certificates concerning estate and transfer tax proceedings

State Regulations

Effective April 8, 1963, the following fees will be
charged: (a) A fee of $2 for a search
of the estate and transfer tax records of the State Tax Commission and a
certificate of the facts disclosed thereby, with reference to the estate of any
decedent; and an additional fee of $1 for advice by telephone or telegraph as
to the facts disclosed by such a search. (b) A fee of $2.50 for a certificate of
payment of estate tax in the form required by the Internal Revenue Service
(currently form TT 66C) for allowance of credit against the Federal estate
tax. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
362.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
